meanings.definition: The state of being separate or distinct from others.
meanings.sent1: The separateness of the islands made them unique.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the separateness of each color in the rainbow.
meanings.sent3: The separateness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: The separateness of the stars in the sky reminded me of how vast the universe is.
meanings.sent5: The separateness of the flavors in the dish created a delightful taste experience.

meanings.definition: The quality of being individual or distinct.
meanings.sent1: Her artistic style had a certain separateness that set her apart.
meanings.sent2: I admire the separateness of each snowflake in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The separateness of his fashion sense always made us smile.
meanings.sent4: The separateness of her voice made her stand out in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The separateness of his ideas brought a fresh perspective to the team.

meanings.definition: The act of dividing or disconnecting.
meanings.sent1: The separateness of the fence marked the boundary clearly.
meanings.sent2: The separateness of the wires prevented them from tangling.
meanings.sent3: The separateness of the roadblocks caused a traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The separateness of the ingredients allowed for easy organization in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The separateness of the rooms in the house provided privacy for each family member.
